name: Kenopsia (Summy99)
description:
kenopsia-n.  the eerie, forlorn atmosphere of a place that’s usually bustling with people but is now abandoned and quiet—a school hallway in the evening, an unlit office on a weekend, vacant fairgrounds—an emotional afterimage that makes it seem not just empty but hyper-empty, with a total population in the negative, who are so conspicuously absent they glow like neon signs.

-The Dictionary of Obscure Sorrows

This is an early build of a game that I hope to continue developing into the future. In the future there will be new areas, more abilities, lots more levels, and hopefully a better ending.

Please enjoy.

Special thanks to my playtesters.

IMPORTANT TECH NOTE: The game runs differently at different refresh rates on your monitor. This can make some jumps harder at lower rates. The game is built and tested at 144Hz, so that is what I recommend you play on, but I realize that is not possible for many people. The game should be beatable at any refresh rate though.
